description: This source file defines the application class for an Android app, responsible for initializing notification channels used for reminders within the app.

classes.name: FitnessTrackerApp
classes.description: An Android Application class that initializes notification channels for reminders.

methods.name: onCreate
methods.description: Called when the application is starting, sets up notification channels.

methods.name: createReminderChannel
methods.description: Creates a notification channel for daily reminders if the API level supports it.
